name: Bird Rides Europe B.V.
goal: Bird is a sustainable electric mobility company that wants to provide cities in the EU with clean and accessible mobility.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
The Motor Insurance Directive
The PLEV standardisation
All on Road Safety
